# [Interview #226: KOD Signing Report - Robert Mee, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=226#9)

#### Robert Jordan

The Book of Translation (Ogier thing) was RAFO'd when asked if it was a
*ter'angreal*
or a dictionary/map.
